live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41675.summary: Some Customers in the City Centre area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41675.title: Sep 12 - Surrey (City Centre) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
